cscie97.asn4.housemate.entitlement

Class Role

  • java.lang.Object
    • cscie97.asn4.housemate.entitlement.Item
      • cscie97.asn4.housemate.entitlement.Entitlement
        • cscie97.asn4.housemate.entitlement.Role
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEntitlementVisitable

    public class Role
extends Entitlement
implements IEntitlementVisitable
    Roles represent aggregations of Permissions and other Roles. A Role defines "who a user is"; for example, a role called "admin_role" would contain all the Permissions that collectively define all the restricted actions that only an EntitlementServiceAPI administrator could perform.
    See Also:
    Entitlement, Role, Permission, User

    • Method Detail

      • getIterator

        public RoleIterator getIterator()
        Returns the iterator for the current Role. The iterator also follows the Singleton pattern; once the iterator has been declared and initialized, the already-declared one will be returned. If the iterator has not been defined when getIterator() is called, a new RoleIterator will be created and initialized.
        Returns:
        the iterator for the Role
